sentences.en: ' stood apart, with countenances of inflexible gravity , beyond what even the Puritan aspect could attain . "
sentences.cn: 站在一旁, 他们脸上那种严肃刚毅的神情, 比清教徒们还 有过之而无不及.

sentences.en: He was inflexible once he had made a decision.
sentences.cn: 他一旦作了决定就不会轻易更改.

sentences.en: He's completely inflexible on the subject.
sentences.cn: 他在这个问题上寸步不让。

sentences.en: Her parents had kept her on a tight rein with their narrow and inflexible views.
sentences.cn: 她的父母观念狭隘而僵化，对她管束很严。

sentences.en: His opponents viewed him as stubborn, dogmatic, and inflexible.
sentences.cn: 他的反对者们认为他固执、教条、僵化。

sentences.en: Many routine datacollection systems are relatively inflexible.
sentences.cn: 很多常规数据收集系统相对说是不易更动的.

sentences.en: Neither threats nor promises could change his inflexible determination.
sentences.cn: 威胁与利诱均不能改变他坚定的决心.

sentences.en: Something of awe now stole over me , as I gazed upon this inflexible iron animal.
sentences.cn: 我凝视着这只顽固的铁兽,不觉有点肃然起敬了.

sentences.en: The emphasis was helped by the speaker's voice, which was inflexible, dry, and dictatorial.
sentences.cn: 讲话者那无转变余地的 、 枯燥的 、 专横的声音, 也在帮助他加强语气.

sentences.en: The new plastic is completely inflexible.
sentences.cn: 这种新塑料是完全不可弯曲的.

sentences.en: The New York ritual was precise and inflexible in such matters.
sentences.cn: 在这种事情上纽约的礼仪既一丝不苟又一成不变.

sentences.en: This approach is too inflexible and too costly.
sentences.cn: 这个方法太死板，而且花费也太高。

sentences.en: This man is very stiff [ inflexible ] .
What a noble - looking old man he is! So stern and inflexible, with such classical features!
sentences.cn: 这老头儿的样子多么高贵!多么庄严坚决! 五官又是多么端正!

sentences.en: When inflexible rules are imposed on flexible humans, both sides lose.
sentences.cn: 当死板的规则强加在灵活的人类身上时, 两面皆输.

words.tran_cn: 不屈性，缺乏弹性；顽固；不变性

trans.tran_cn: 僵硬的，不可弯曲的，不屈服的，不能转变的，坚定不移的
trans.tran_en: inflexible rules, arrangements etc are impossible to change
